Description EN: Hiden Achivement
Comments: Дефолтное значение пока ачивка не открыта

Description EN: Make more than 50 scans total
Comments: User unlocks this achievement by actively using the app and reaching more than 50 total scans across all time.

Description EN: Finish your last 3 active days in profit
Comments: Unlocks when the user’s last 3 active gameplay days all ended with a positive daily P&L. Only days with scans count.

Description EN: Finish your last 3 active days in loss
Comments: Unlocks when the user’s last 3 active gameplay days all ended with a negative daily P&L. Only days with scans count.

Description EN: Start the day with loss
Comments: Unlocks when a day starts with loss if first daily scan negative

Description EN: Trying harder won’t unlock it… or will it?
Description RU: Думал, что если жать сильнее — откроется?
Comments: Unlocks when the user repeatedly taps the same locked achievement icon at least 5 times within a 5-second window, attempting to brute-force unlock it. Only counts taps on the same locked achievement. Unlocks once.

Description EN: Gain more than 3M in a single jump
Comments: Triggers when a single scan produces a large positive jump over +3 million.

Description EN: Lose more than 3M in a single drop
Comments: Triggers when a single scan produces a large negative drop below -3 million.

Description EN: Open the app after midnight.
Comments: Unlocks when the user opens the app after midnight (00:00–05:00).

Description EN: Finish the day without tilting.
Description RU: Закончите день, ни разу не нажав “Я сгорел”.
Comments: Unlocks when an active gameplay day ends without pressing the tilt button at all.

Description EN: Hit “I’m Tilted” 20 times total.
Comments: Unlocks once the user presses the tilt button at least 20 times total.

Description EN: Met a cheater, then undid it
Logic (условие для кода): cheater_marked == true and cheater_unmarked == true and time_between_actions <= 5s
Comments: Unlocks when the user hit cheater! button and then reverses that action shortly after, indicating hesitation or second thoughts.

Description EN: Open the app 5 times in one day.
Comments: Unlocks when the user opens the app at least 5 separate times in one calendar day.

Description EN: Tilt immediately after launching the app.
Comments: Unlocks when the user presses the tilt button within 5 seconds after launching the app.

Description EN: Make two scans within 3 seconds.
Description RU: Сделайте два скана в течение 3 секунд.
Comments: Unlocks when the user performs two scans within 3 seconds of each other.

Description EN: Get a tiny balance change ≤100k.
Comments: Unlocks when a scan results in a very small balance change (≤100k).

Description EN: Read 10 quotes in a single day.
Comments: Unlocks when the user reads at least 10 quotes within one calendar day.

Description EN: Cheater + Tilt + Red in one day.
Comments: Unlocks when, within the same local calendar day, the user records at least 1 Cheater, presses Tilt at least once, and presses Red at least once. Day counters reset when the local date changes.

Description EN: Meet 5 cheaters in one day.
Comments: Unlocks when the user increments the Cheater counter to 5 or more within the same local calendar day. Counter resets on local date change.

Description EN: Find 5 Reds in one day.
Comments: Unlocks when the user increments the Red counter to 5 or more within the same local calendar day. Counter resets on local date change.

Description EN: Find the Heart of Africa in the app.
Comments: Hidden easter egg. A small, not-obvious sprite exists in the UI. When the user clicks it for the first time, unlock this achievement and permanently hide/disable the sprite for that user (persisted).
